summary: Build a website platform with unified backend workflows (requests, testimonies, messages, coupons, orders) and a secured admin access page for dashboard entry with audit logging.
architectural_notes: Admin access requires a master access code; successful logins must be timestamped and logged (audit trail).

existing_features.title: Implement Phase 6A Admin Access Page and gating so that entering the master access code "7583A" is required before an admin can enter the administrative dashboard, with incorrect entries denied.

Wire the Admin Access Page to the backend verification API and persist the unlocked state on the client so that a page refresh does not immediately re-lock during the same session (while still allowing lockout on explicit logout).

Update the admin dashboard entry UX to clearly communicate the two-step security requirement (Internet Identity admin role + master access code) using English user-facing text, without modifying read-only/immutable frontend paths.

new_feature_requests.summary: Phase 5F — Unified Backend: unify requests, testimonies, messages, coupons, and orders into one backend for smooth admin/customer workflow
Phase 6A — Admin Access Page: require master access code to enter admin dashboard; deny incorrect entries; log successful logins with timestamps

Add a backend API to verify the master access code "7583A" for admin principals and record a successful-login audit log entry containing the caller principal and a timestamp, and expose an admin-only query to read these audit log entries.

Complete Phase 5F Unified Backend by ensuring requests, testimonies, messages, coupons, and orders are handled in the single Motoko backend actor with consistent, end-to-end workflows that match the frontend’s existing React Query hooks and admin UI flows.

projectName: Phase 5F Unified Backend + Phase 6A Admin Access Code Gate with Audit Logging
